welcome.content: Let's take a quick tour to help you get started with all the amazing features.

offline.step3: Perfect for travel and remote areas

install.title: Install Tarjama
install.description: Install the app on your device for offline access and a better experience

dictionary.title: Darija Dictionary
dictionary.subtitle: Common Darija phrases
dictionary.faq1Q: How do I use the dictionary?
dictionary.faq1A: Simply browse through the entries or use the search feature to find specific Darija words. Click on any word card to see detailed information including pronunciation, examples, and related words.
dictionary.faq2Q: What information is shown for each word?
dictionary.faq2A: Each word entry includes the Darija word, Arabic script, type (noun/verb/pronoun), pronunciation guide, definition, multiple examples with translations in Darija, Arabic, French and English, plus related words.
dictionary.faq3Q: Can I hear how words are pronounced?
dictionary.faq3A: Yes! Click on any word card to open the detail view, then use the play button next to the word or examples to hear the pronunciation.
dictionary.faq4Q: What types of words are in the dictionary?
dictionary.faq4A: The dictionary includes common Darija verbs, nouns, pronouns, adjectives, and phrases with their translations and usage examples.
dictionary.faq5A: Each word comes with real-world usage examples showing the word in context, with translations in multiple languages to help you understand how to use it naturally.
dictionary.faq6A: Related words are other Darija words that are connected in meaning or usage, helping you expand your vocabulary and understand word relationships.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Our mission
about.mainDescription1: is your bridge to Moroccan Darija, the vibrant spoken Arabic dialect of Morocco.
about.mainDescription2: Whether you're planning to visit Morocco, connect with Moroccan friends and family, or simply explore a new language, Tarjama makes it easy to understand and communicate in Darija.
about.targetAudience: Perfect for travelers, language learners, expats, and anyone interested in Moroccan culture. Our app helps you navigate real-world conversations with confidence.
about.freeFeature: Best of all, Tarjama is completely free to use!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.formDescription: Have a question or feedback? Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us what's on your mind...
contact.successDescription: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.
contact.errorDescription: Please try again or contact us directly.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Questions
faq.a1: Darija is the Moroccan Arabic dialect spoken by millions in Morocco. It's distinct from Modern Standard Arabic and includes influences from Berber, French, and Spanish.
faq.a2: Simply enter or paste your text in the input field, select your target language, and click translate. You can also use voice input by clicking the microphone icon.
faq.a3: Yes! Tarjama is completely free to use with all features available at no cost.
faq.a4: Tarjama supports 11+ languages including Darija, French, Arabic, English, Spanish, German, Italian, Portuguese, Chinese, Japanese, Turkish, Russian, Korean, and Hindi.
faq.a5: Our translations are highly accurate, powered by advanced AI that understands Darija's unique expressions and cultural nuances.
faq.a6: Yes! Download languages for offline use in the settings. This allows you to translate even without an internet connection.
faq.q7: How do I use voice input?
faq.a7: Click the microphone icon, speak clearly in your chosen language, and Tarjama will transcribe and translate your speech automatically.
faq.q8: Why choose Tarjama over other translators?
faq.a8: Tarjama specializes in Darija, providing culturally accurate translations that other generic translators often miss. We understand the nuances of Moroccan dialect.
faq.q9: Does Tarjama save my translation history?
faq.a9: Yes, all your translations are automatically saved locally on your device. You can access them anytime in the history section.
faq.a10: Our Dictionary provides common Darija phrases and words with translations, helping you learn the language faster.
faq.q11: Can I delete my translation history?
faq.a11: Yes, you can clear your entire history or remove individual translations at any time from the history panel.
faq.a12: Yes, you can enable or disable the profanity filter in the settings based on your preference.
faq.cantFindAnswer: Can't find what you're looking for?
